languages.text: "Идем со мной, Эклендиль. Перед великим забвением нам еще многое предстоит сделать. Мы найдем наших братьев и сестер и защитим от тех, кто жаждет им навредить. Быть может, нам даже удастся найти новый дом..."

traits.locale_text: "Идем со мной, Эклендиль. Перед великим забвением нам еще многое предстоит сделать. Мы найдем наших братьев и сестер и защитим от тех, кто жаждет им навредить. Быть может, нам даже удастся найти новый дом..."

languages.text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."
languages.original_text: "Идем со мной, Эклендиль. Перед великим забвением нам еще многое предстоит сделать. Мы найдем наших братьев и сестер и защитим от тех, кто жаждет им навредить. Быть может, нам даже удастся найти новый дом..."

traits.locale_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

"Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

"Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

"Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

languages.text: «Ven conmigo, Eklendyl. Tenemos mucho que hacer antes de entregarnos al olvido eterno. Encontraremos a nuestros hermanos y hermanas, y les protegeremos de quienes pretenden hacerles daño. Tal vez incluso hallemos un nuevo hogar...».
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: «Ven conmigo, Eklendyl. Tenemos mucho que hacer antes de entregarnos al olvido eterno. Encontraremos a nuestros hermanos y hermanas, y les protegeremos de quienes pretenden hacerles daño. Tal vez incluso hallemos un nuevo hogar...».

languages.text: 「一緒に来てくれ、エクレンディル。大いなる忘却の前にやるべきことが沢山ある。我々の兄弟姉妹を探し出し、害を及ぼそうとする者たちから彼らを守るのだ。もしかしたら、新しい故郷を見つけることすらできるかもしれない…」
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: 「一緒に来てくれ、エクレンディル。大いなる忘却の前にやるべきことが沢山ある。我々の兄弟姉妹を探し出し、害を及ぼそうとする者たちから彼らを守るのだ。もしかしたら、新しい故郷を見つけることすらできるかもしれない…」

languages.text: “跟我来吧，埃克伦迪，在最终的湮灭来临之前，我们还有很多事情要做。我们要找到我们的兄弟姐妹，保护他们免受伤害。也许，我们还能找到新的家园……”
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: “跟我来吧，埃克伦迪，在最终的湮灭来临之前，我们还有很多事情要做。我们要找到我们的兄弟姐妹，保护他们免受伤害。也许，我们还能找到新的家园……”

languages.text: « Venez avec moi, Eklendyl. Nous avons beaucoup à faire avant de sombrer dans l'oubli. Nous trouverons nos frères et nos sœurs, et nous les protégerons de ceux qui cherchent à leur faire du mal. Peut-être trouverons-nous même un autre foyer... »
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: « Venez avec moi, Eklendyl. Nous avons beaucoup à faire avant de sombrer dans l'oubli. Nous trouverons nos frères et nos sœurs, et nous les protégerons de ceux qui cherchent à leur faire du mal. Peut-être trouverons-nous même un autre foyer... »

languages.text: "Kommt mit mir, Eklendyl. Wir haben viel zu tun, bevor wir vergessen können. Wir werden unsere Brüder und Schwestern finden und sie dann beschützen vor allen, die ihnen etwas antun wollen. Und vielleicht finden wir sogar ein neues Zuhause ..."
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt mit mir, Eklendyl. Wir haben viel zu tun, bevor wir vergessen können. Wir werden unsere Brüder und Schwestern finden und sie dann beschützen vor allen, die ihnen etwas antun wollen. Und vielleicht finden wir sogar ein neues Zuhause ..."

languages.text: "Ölümü kucaklamadan önce yapmamız gereken daha çok şey var. Kardeşlerimizi bulup onlara zarar vermek isteyenlerden koruyacağız. Hem kim bilir, belki kendimize yeni bir yuva bile bulabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Come with me, Eklendyl. We have a lot to do before the great oblivion. We will find our brothers and sisters and protect them from those who seek to harm them. Perhaps we may even find a new home..."

traits.locale_text: Ölümü kucaklamadan önce yapmamız gereken daha çok şey var. Kardeşlerimizi bulup onlara zarar vermek isteyenlerden koruyacağız. Hem kim bilir, belki kendimize yeni bir yuva bile bulabiliriz."
